## utils.colour.hexToRgb() function

Converts a colour to RGB.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hexToRgb(colour: string): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  colour | string | String representing colour in any colour format ('\#ff0000', 'red', '0xff000', etc).  RGB representation of the colour.  Blockly.utils.colour.hexToRgb |

<b>Returns:</b>

number\[\]
